title: Lover's Talisman
description: Five mortal men, their lives dedicated to protecting Talisman Bay from unimaginable horrors. No one knows what they really do... Until one man compromises his duty to save a woman's life. But his mistake shows a weakness...A weakness someone has been waiting for. Now one woman's missing and another woman's life is in grave danger. And Stephan Rashleigh has to make right his mistake. And walk away from the woman he's fallen for. Welcome to Talisman Bay. Where all hell breaks loose on a daily basis...especially when you fall in love.
author: Ashleigh Raine
